name: Infinite Wheel
description:
Hey there, here's my game Infinite Wheel made for the LudumDare.

In infinite wheel you play as a little orc and you have to avoid some spike to stay alive the longest time possible.

Everything was made during the jam ^^

Have a good day.

If the game don't launch, i'm sorry. Please download it for testing ^^

Control :

  • Space to jump ( You can hold it to jump higher )
